Key Match Events: David Fry hit the franchise’s first go-ahead, pinch-hit home run to secure the win on the road.
Pre-Game Insights: The Tigers have their backs against the wall, and they wouldn’t have it any other way.
José Ramírez and Emmanuel Clase’s resurgence has Guardians flying high entering Game 5
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rainy weather has prompted MLB to move up Game 5 of the American League Division Series between the Cleveland Guardians and Detroit Tigers.
The winner of Saturday’s game will meet the New York Yankees in the American League Championship Series, set to begin Monday night in The Bronx.
Others: The Guardians won a back-and-forth affair 5-4 on Thursday to force the fifth and decisive game of the series.
